statements: SELECT * FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE gene_id = 10;
SELECT sample_id, expression_level FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE expression_level > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM transcriptomic_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM transcriptomic_data GROUP BY gene_id;
SELECT sample_id, gene_id, expression_level FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE expression_level < 0.2 ORDER BY expression_level ASC;
SELECT gene_id, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM transcriptomic_data GROUP BY gene_id HAVING avg_expression > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_expression DESC;
SELECT gene_id, COUNT(sample_id) AS num_samples FROM transcriptomic_data GROUP BY gene_id ORDER BY num_samples DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id FROM transcriptomic_data WHERE gene_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY gene_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, chromosome FROM genes ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM genes WHERE gene_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, chromosome, gene_symbol FROM genes WHERE chromosome = '1';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_value FROM genes JOIN expression_values ON genes.gene_id = expression_values.gene_id WHERE expression_value > 0.5;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_symbol LIKE 'AT%';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM gene_expression;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT organism_name, tissue_type, age FROM sample_metadata WHERE age > 50;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_type, result FROM experiment_results ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, tissue_type FROM gene_expression JOIN sample_metadata ON gene_expression.gene_id = sample_metadata.sample_id;
SELECT experiment_id, gene_name, result FROM experiment_results JOIN gene_expression ON experiment_results.gene_id = gene_expression.gene_id WHERE result BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE chromosome_number = 2;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence, gene_function FROM genes WHERE start_position > 100 AND end_position < 500;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'DNA';
SELECT sample_name, sample_description, organism_name FROM samples WHERE organism_name = 'E. coli';
SELECT * FROM genes WHERE chromosome_number = 1
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE start_position < 1000 ORDER BY gene_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence, chromosome_number FROM genes WHERE chromosome_number IN (1, 2, 3) AND gene_function = 'Biological Process'
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM genes WHERE start_position BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND end_position > 2000
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, organism_name FROM samples JOIN experiments ON samples.sample_id = experiments.sample_id ORDER BY sample_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Sample
SELECT id, sample_name FROM Sample
SELECT tissue_type FROM Sample WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type FROM Sample ORDER BY tissue_type ASC
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type FROM Sample WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_name DESC
SELECT id, sample_name, tissue_type FROM Sample ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT sample_name, experiment_date FROM Sample WHERE tissue_type = 'Brain' OR tissue_type = 'Heart'
SELECT id, sample_name, experiment_date FROM Sample WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5
